Articles.Content: Just telling people it exists. The old one was unstickied and a new one placed, managed by Andrew Hansen.

I'm so confused about all these changes..

So they are getting rid of spaceport??

I don't like the look of The new curse based site.

It has bad news written all over it.

I voted to scrap it.
We really don't need this thread guys, sorry, I know everyone wants to post in GD but we have other forums for a reason (clutter)
